name: Clampessor File Archiver
description:
Is your phone clogged up with lots of files? ( YES )
Are you getting constant notifications that you have no free space on your device? ( YES )
Would you please stop downloading image reactions, cat gifs and viral videos? ( NO )

Then this is the app for you!

Clampressor File Archiver will compress all your problems away! Try now for a free 1-hour trial with no ads! Come get it now!
